comment.author: 77924145@N04
comment._content:
Great picture but this is a 155 mm gun (the 155 mm refers to the bore diameter of the gun tube) not a 155 cm gun. A 155 cm gun would have a bore diameter of over and 1.5 meters or just over 4.5 feet ! That would be 10x larger than the gun shown in this picture.

Brian
